main event: Two witnesses observed a light in the sky over Kettering, Ohio, which changed colors and had no discernible shape.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 20 minutes,The object appeared as a star but was brighter,It changed colors between red, green, and white,The object moved suddenly, accelerated, and then appeared to break apart,No physical evidence was found, confirming authorities noted the object was likely related to military maneuvers.
sighted object: a light changing colors in the sky
witness description: One witness was a private pilot and another witness is named Rob Hettinger.
